posts.message:
While attending Sydney JavaScript usergroup this month (@SydJS), I recorded Patrick Roumanoff's (@pkr2) session on what JavaScript promises are the similarities and differences in implementing them in different JavaScript frameworks like jQuery & Angular.JS. Watch it!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sY9R68mhqI

posts.description: My readers know I have been experimenting with video publishing for a while, focusing on simplicity in getting releases out. I started with a simple introduction to the new Angular.JS library, a simple productivity trick for all users, and then a simple and old cross browser CSS trick. In the 3 vide...
